about_the_game:
Timewell: Trail of Celestes combines the excitement of a space shooter with the depth of a story-driven RPG. As the A.I. SAT-V, pilot a Vulcan class space fighter through the Timewell Universe using 4 DOF (4 degree of freedom) gameplay. SAT-V has a unique artificial personality and can adapt to different levels of difficulty by changing its capabilities through skills and adaptations, on the fly. Use your strategy and skill points to guide SAT-V to victory in this fast-paced space combat adventure.

* Note: Trailer and Game Music Credits go to most talented composer and music scientist Scott Buckley. You certainly rock my friend !




Gameplay




  • Timewell Universe: Trail of Celestes is the first installment in Timewell Universe where Space Combat meets story-driven gameplay and Space RPG. Can you uncover the truth behind the struggle of supreme beings known as Celestes and their formidable opponents, Constructs?





  • Story Mode: A tale of suspense and deceit takes place in the exotic corners of the galaxy. You control a Vulcan class space fighter as the A.I. SAT-V. Can you guide her to her destiny on this RPG themed space shooter?





  • Skills / Adaptations: Having an artificial personality of its own, SAT-V can adapt to varying degrees of difficulties and change its capabilities via skills and adaptations. You can alter the skill points and perks on the fly and enhance your gameplay with different tactics. Can you overcome perils with brain as well as brawn?



  • Achievements / Relics: Fun feats that can be unlocked throughout the game provide Relics as rewards and they are added to your inventory on each play through. These relics are alien artifacts that can boost SAT-V’s stats and skills. Once unlocked via Achievements, Epic and Legendary Relics provide unique boosts to your gaming style.



  • Customize Looks: You can customize look and feel of your ship with paint modes randomly looted from enemies. When unlocked, they are yours and you can use them on each play through.



  • Skirmish Mode: For casual players, fast skirmish mode with different world settings is also included. Each zone has a secret mini-boss to encounter. Are you up for the challenge for this space combat RPG?



  • Easter Eggs: Funny (and somewhat mysterious?!) easter eggs wait for you to be discovered. Can you solve the riddles of The Unfathomable Scholar ? Can you ?!




Enjoy and breath in the rich atmosphere of Timewell Universe where SAT-V plays a key role in the survival of three galactic races. May you guide SAT-V to her destination through an adventure of deceit and suspense?



The Story





In the year 3099, earth had a major crisis of resources, pollution, and unjust economy. Governments controlled by megatechs invested in creating the ultimate artificial intelligence with a personality to increase their reach in the galaxy.



SAT-V (Super Adaptive Tech), the latest version of artificial intelligence research was designed to overcome perils with unparalleled ingenuity as well as firepower.



Burdened with the task of finding a goldilocks planet of bountiful resources, SAT-V got a mysterious signal of an unknown origin on the outskirts of Titan.

Reaching the destination, SAT-V encountered a portal, a gaping hole in the fabric of spacetime. Without hesitation, it took the first step in the human history and made the perilous jump.



After the spacetime jump, SAT-V had a startling revelation: an unknown entity emerged from SAT-V’s cerebral nexus and took the leading role of her virtual personalities. Providing little information about its origin, the entity gave SAT-V various tasks to reach the final destination, where humanity will be rewarded by supreme beings mentioned as Celestes.



Thus starts the Trail Of Celestes…

See you folks in the next cycle where the story continues ! :)

highlighted.name: Leash Your Dog Sir, Or I will !

detailed_description:
Merry Christmas From The Future!



Merry Christmas from the future!

May your holiday season be filled with festive cheer and enough energy to power a spaceship. May your stockings be filled with gadgets and gizmos aplenty, and may you have a holly jolly time with your loved ones (even if they're not human).

Wishing you a holiday season that's truly full of love and health. Happy holidays!

Sincerely,
Developer Team


IMPORTANT UPDATES!

We have listened to you and made these major updates:

- Frame rate is 60 fps
- Increased the texture quality to 4k
- Optimized general fidelity of graphics and added details to all levels.
- Added cinematic effects such as realistic depth of field and camera focal length
- Ship’s movement is more dynamic (yaw rotation is calculated dynamically).
- Satellites’ active range is lowered (they are more likely to stop intercepting when the player gets out of its range)
- Gatling Gun’s energy consumption is lowered.


BUY NOW!


SUBSCRIBE TO OUR NEWSLETTER !


WANNA WRITE A REVIEW?



We will really appreciate if you write a review. That way you can be a part of the production process.

name: Timewell: Trail of Celestes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: NVIDIA GTX 760, AMD Radeon 7970 / R9280X GPU RAM: 2 GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-8400 CPU or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1050TI GPU RAM: 4 GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dive into an immersive space shooter adventure with Timewell: Trail of Celestes. As SAT-V, explore new planets and fight against Constructs in a RPG storyline. Customize her skills and adaptations for a unique space combat experience. Are you ready to guide SAT-V through a perilous universe?
